casebody.data:
(Republished.)

In the Matter of the City of New York, Appellant-Respondent, Relative to Acquiring Title to Real Property, Bounded by West 100th Street, and Other Streets, in the Borough of Manhattan, Required for a Project Known as West Park (Manhattan Town) Slum Clearance Project. Jafs Realty Corporation et al., Appellants; Manuel Padin et al., Respondents-Appellants, and A. & W. Realty Corp. et al., Respondents.

Order modified by reducing the building values in accordance with the opinion herein and, as so modified, affirmed. Opinion Per Curiam. Concur — Callahan, Breitel, Botein and Rabin, JJ.; Cohn, J. P., dissents in part in opinion. Settle order on notice. [See ante. p. 821.]
